entities.name: fred
entities.description: Fred is mentioned as a person who has a scar like lightning, indicating he is likely Harry Potter.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character and is referred to by his name in the conversation with his mother.

entities.name: you-know-who
entities.description: You-Know-Who is a reference to Lord Voldemort, a central figure in the Harry Potter series.

relationships.description: Fred's scar is compared to You-Know-Who's appearance, indicating that Fred has a similar lightning-shaped scar.
Harry and Fred are brothers, as they are referred to together in the conversation with their mother.
